ring in.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to telephone the place where you work
ring in.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Jane’s rung in to say she’ll be late.
He rang in sick (=telephoned to say he was ill) every morning for a week.
ring in.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to celebrate the beginning of the New Year
